name: Braya
title: The Bouncer

features.title: Second Wind
features.desc: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

features.title: Action Surge
features.desc: On your turn, you can take one additional action.

features.title: Combat Superiority
features.desc: You have 4 superiority dice (d8s). You can expend one die to use a Maneuver. Maneuvers Known: Menacing Attack, Pushing Attack, Riposte.

features.title: Savage Attacks
features.desc: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

equipment: Splint mail, a greataxe, two handaxes, a set of common clothes, an explorer's pack, and a pouch with 10 gp.

personality.traits: I'm always polite and respectful. I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.
personality.ideal: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect.
personality.bond: My honor is my life. I will never break an oath.
personality.flaw: I have a crude sense of humor that sometimes gets me into trouble.
